hypothesis_content.title: Low Gas + Bull Regime -> Layer 2 Token Outperformance
hypothesis_content.statement: During BULL regime, when ETH gas fees (7-day avg) drop below 30-day 25th percentile while ETH price remains above 20D MA, Layer 2 tokens (ARB, OP, MATIC) will outperform ETH by >3% over next 5 trading days as low fees signal healthy scaling adoption.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sustained low gas during bull markets suggests successful Layer 2 scaling, directing capital toward infrastructure tokens benefiting from adoption. Historical correlation: 0.41 between gas percentiles and L2/ETH ratios.
entry_conditions: Enter long ARB/ETH, OP/ETH, or MATIC/ETH pairs
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: L2 tokens underperform despite low gas, indicating market focus elsewhere (e.g., AI tokens, memes) or concerns about L2 centralization/competition.
